lead_paragraph: Dale Earnhardt Jr. and Kevin Harvick each strengthened their personally owned race teams when the drivers teamed up with their respective Nextel Cup team owners. The car owner Rick Hendrick will merge his Busch team into JR Motorsports, the Busch team Earnhardt owns. Harvick strengthened the existing alliance between Richard Childress and Kevin Harvick Inc., which races in the Busch and Truck Series.
